subtitle: A very tasty dish. You can use haddock or cod for this recipe.

method.text: Remove the skin from the haddock. Cut the fish into 2 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm pieces.
Melt the butter in a frying pan. Fry the onion and garlic until softened but not browned. Add the haddock and cook gently for 3-4 min.
Stir in the lemon rind and juice, parsley and prawns. Season with black pepper. Cook for 2-4 min. Spoon into a flameproof dish.
Mix the remaining ingredients together and spoon on top of the fish. Grill until the topping is hot and crispy or bake in oven for 15 min.

title: Crunchy topped haddock
